page.title: 04Village Hall Activities
page.content:
The{Village Hall}in{Preston Brook}was opened in 1976. It was paid for by villagers' donations, local grants and donations from new local industry.
It is the centre of community life and is fully used as follows:
{Whist Drive}- fortnightly {Senior Citizens}- weekly {Play Group}- three mornings per week {Mother and Baby Group}- one afternoon {Arts and Crafts Club}- fortnightly {Badminton and Slimmers}- weekly {Popmobility}- weekly {Preston Brook W.I.}- monthly {Parish Council Meetings}- as required
There are also{public and private {functions}as occasion demands on Fridays and Saturdays.
